channel.title: How would i
channel.description: how would i add str bonus to a non existing item and change the attack emote ect..

item.title: How would i
item.dc:creator: @pure_ownz01 pure ownz01
item.description:
@pure_ownz01 wrote:

[quote=“Rrie, post:2, topic:175762”]Search the item ID in your item.dat file and then go to the 2nd to last number on that row and change it.[/quote] retard i’m asking how would i add a non existing items and add attack emote and str bonus.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 24, 2008, 02:04:00 PM[/size][hr]nvm got it my self thanks anyway but i still need to know how to change the attack emote.

Read full topic

item.title: How would i
item.dc:creator: @Rrie Rrie
item.description:
@Rrie wrote:

Search the item ID in your item.dat file and then go to the 2nd to last number on that row and change it.

If you used better grammar I could understand it better.
